reviews.sentence: Great location and if you get room 245 a great view with total privacy. Spacious rooms great location and all you need for a terrific holiday base. Surfing 400 yards away San Diego a bus ride away. it is all there. We have stayed 12 times now and have booked again for January.

Walking distance to beach. Easy to find very clean kitchen was a good size and equipped with the necessities. The two young ladies that worked the front desk where very helpful and polite. Espicaly Trisha. I tend to loose sense of direction. Trisha went out of her way to write down spacific directions to where I wanted to go. If she did not know she would find it on google. Very empresed. it is hard to find and expierence customer service like that anymore. I will definately recommend The Travelodge to all my friends and family. can not wait until next year to visit again. Thank you Pegy Murray.
Great value for quick getaway. Great value for an awesome location. Room feels dated but was very clean. Staff was awesome breakfast was nice bed was comfortable. Bathroom rather cramped but clean.

Just a Lovely Place. I had the loveliest for a staycation at the Travelodge La Jola Beach. Everyone there from Will Olga and Tricia at the front desk to Florencia in housekeeping was so welcoming and professional. The rooms are very well appointed the parking is free and so is the wifi. There is coffee fruit and water at all times in the lobby and danish and bagels are added for breakfast. The jacuzi is lovely and the property is very near the beach. I will definitely return.

An Outstanding Value. This is an excellent basic motel. It does not try to be a luxurious 5 star resort. It does what it sets out to do in an outstanding manner. All staff were super. Room was clean well furnished comfortable and quiet with small refrigerator coffee maker and microwave. Free parking was a blessing close and convenient. Breakfast was as advertised a basic continental layout with juice coffee tea. Overall this is an outstanding value. I have made numerous 2 5 day business trips to La Jola and have tried different hotels. The Travelodge is by far the best value. It will be my first choice in the future.

EXTREMELY COMFY AND OVERALL THE ROOM WAS NICE AND CLEAN. THE ROOM WAS REALLY SPACIOUS AND COZY. THE BATHROOM WAS REALLY CLEAN AND PRETTY DECENT SIZE. ALSO THE STAFF WAS EXTREMELY NICE AND POLITE. WILL DEFINITELY RECOMMEND THIS PLACE TO FAMILY AND FRIENDS AND WILL PROBABLY BE STAYING HERE AGAIN. THANKS. NOTHING AT ALL.

Beautiful La Jola. La Jola is a lovely area to stay in. The hotel staff were friendly and helpful. The complimentary breakfast was tasty it was bagels danishes coffee juice cereal etc. The room was comfy and clean with a separate makeup table magnified mirror so that my family could shower while I was doing my makeup for the day. something I appreciated as we were always on the go. It was a short drive to the beaches and the area is so beautiful. I think it is only about 5 minutes drive south to downtown San Diego. The breakfast though tasty was in the reception area and the only seating was one park bench outside and the pool area which was locked so you had to ask for a key. The pool looked a bit dirty on the bottom needed cleaning. We arrived early evening and did not see any restaurants and had to go for a drive to find one. These things were minor though so I would stay there again.

Not best value in town. Location ie the beach is only a 3 minutes walk away. And at least there is a real vacation atmosphere. The friendliness of the staff. The standard of the acomodation. The Travelodge is a motel with the standard of the Motel 6 category that we have visited on our honeymoon trip 33 years ago. Our apartment was a time capsule added with Wifi unstable. When entering the room 218 there was a unpleasant smell. Probably caused by the old carpet floor. The shifting window of the main room could not be opened at all blocked by screws. A bit better in the bathroom The shifting window can be opened at least half then to be limited by a screw. We tried to let fresh air in by opening the entrance door of the apartment fully or in part but with no lasting benefit. Fortunately the apartment was on the first floor. Breakfast was included but there is no breakfast room. In the reception room there are boards on the left and the right side where guests can take coffee juice milk cereals bagels croissants and few stuff for the bread peanut butter and cream chease and 1 type of jelly but no honey. Guests have to sit on banks at the outside wall of the house facing the parking cars. Fortunately the friendly staff member Tricia advised us to sit at the tables around the swimming pool where a wall seperated us from the onsite parking ground and the traffic on La Jola Blvd. But when there is no staff around nobody will show the guests this escape has happened on our second morning. With a little good will and investment things could be improved a lot. Best value in town as they write on their banner is definitely wrong and deceiving.

Quick mid week getaway. Check in was quick and easy. The room itself is quite small. and it ’s just me staying here. but it is in perfect walking distance to the beach 5mins and restaurants. So not bad for a one or 2 night stay.

Will choose again. 3 minute walk to the beach was great. Less than 10 minute drive to the best eateries in the area. Traffic was light and easy. The staff especially Nick were awesome. The pool and hot tube were a plus. Nice room size was helpful. Tight parking especially late at night. Breakfast was ok for a snack kind of bland for the family tastes but doable if you are in a hurry. Oh the bed was OK for a double bed my liked it but I not so much little too soft.

Great location. Clean. Spacious rooms. Walking distance location for beach and great restaurants. Staff was very friendly and efficient. As I was leaving I saw they had bikes available you might want to check into that. The mattress in our room was super soft the kind that sinks inwards when you sit on it. My wife and I are both in our 50s and would have preferred more support when sleeping. As a result neither of us got a decent nights sleep. Our kids on the other hand did not even notice and slept well. The reception area tv had CN on the whole time. Could find remote to change. FYI management some of us go on vacation to escape from such things.

Its great I am going there with more family to stay longer in about a week. Bed was real comfy beach like a 5 min walk like 4 different type of places to eat within walking distance staff very happy to please. They do not have a elevator for those with Maybe a disability.
